question: (Mike and Mike in the ESPN studio deliver the clue)"The best sports innovation in the last 50 years has got to be the addition of the 3-point play to basketball it opens up the whole court""Nope, sorry, it's actually the use of this immediate rebroadcasting of a game segment (for all us guys who missed it while we were in the bathroom)"
